resources.string: Hi there, I am Angus, the author of this game. I am a year 3 computer science student from SFU, and currently studying CMPT276. Hope you will enjoy this game
Congratulation! You have won the game!

This game is about the user has to find all the missing airplane behind those card./n/n When the user clicked once, if there is an airplane under that field, the airplane will be displayed. However, if there has no airplane, there will display a hint number that tell you how many airplane are there in the same row and same column in the field that the user have clicked.

Besides, after the airplane has displayed, you can clicked once again to display the hint number.

However, this game is to aim for using the fewest scan to finish the game. Good Luck!

Airplane button and main screen airplane: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/84/Aereo_svg.png/640px-Aereo_svg.png

 Congratulation dialog: https://www.kindpng.com/imgv/ibooiJb_transparent-confetti-clip-art-emoji-celebrate-hd-png/

 Sky Photo used in Game and Option Screen: https://stock.adobe.com/search?k=cartoon%20sky

 Sky Photo used in welcome screen: https://www.istockphoto.com/vector/clouds-over-blue-sky-cartoon-background-vector-illustration-gm1086911620-291613190

 Background photo used in Help Screen: https://www.123rf.com/photo_134956513_multiple-question-marks-in-speech-bubbles-forming-side-border-o-a-bright-yellow-background-with-copy.html?vti=lpv43pe72yoo59rvaa-1-1

 Background photo used in Menu Screen: https://www.freepik.com/free-photos-vectors/cartoon-airport
Number of game in each configuration
